unnormalised: Regarding the recent publication, I believe Dr. R.K. Sharma, PhD, Professor of Economics at Delhi University, provides a critical perspective. As per the author, Ms. Aishwarya Krishnan, CEO of Zenith Corp, the data needs further scrutiny.
normalised: Regarding the recent publication, I believe Doctor R.K. Sharma, P-h-D, Professor of Economics at Delhi University, provides a critical perspective. As per the author, Miss Aishwarya Krishnan, C-E-O of Zenith Corp, the data needs further scrutiny.
